name: Mr.Whiskers Revenge
description:
LIMITATION:

Made for the Mini Jam: 80 Cats, with a limitation of only using 8x8 Textures.

The limitation was implemented within the main objects of the game. You may notice the table is a bit large however the table is made of multiple 8x8 sprites. The background textures aren't 8x8 tho, I assumed this was an exception to the rule.

HOW TO PLAY:

Recommended to play on fullscreen. This my first finished game jam so tell me how you like it! The bugs are plentiful on this one ;)

Mr. Whiskers hasn't been fed on time! Now at the crack of midnight he shall take his revenge by throwing everything off the table.

As Mr. Whisker's your goal is to throw everything off the table, before the timer runs out, and Mr. Whiskers owner returns. There are 5 levels for Mr. Whiskers to Meticulously plot his revenge. 

Controls; 'A' and 'D' to move, as well as 'W' to jump. Press 'P' to push objects. However watch out, when you throw an object off of a table the time till owner comes decreases.
